official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to changes in the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 proposed in the President's budget for fiscal year 1983.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that changes to the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 proposed in the FY 1983 budget should not be implemented.
